com.worizon.net

Class HttpRequester.TransformerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worizon.net.HttpRequester.TransformerContext
  • Enclosing class:
    HttpRequester

    public class HttpRequester.TransformerContext
extends Object
    This class represents the context of a request body transformation. All transformers receive a transformer object as parameter, through this context the transformer has access to the request content and request headers in order to read or manipulate somehow.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpRequester.TransformerContext()

      Adds an HTTP header to this context object.

      Sets the value of the request body.
      boolean shouldContinue()
      Checks if the transformation loop should continue with the whole transformation.
      void shouldContinue(boolean shouldContinue)
      Sets the transformation loop to continue transforming or not.
      boolean skipNext()
      Checks if the transformation loop should skip next transformer.
      void skipNext(boolean skipNext)
      Sets the next transformer in the transformation chain to be skipped.
